mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY, 'yyyy/mm/dd') PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY, PUR_COUNT AS PUR_COUNT, SUM(PLANT_SUM) OVER( ORDER BY PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY) AS PLANT_SUM, SUM(KIT_SUM) OVER( ORDER BY PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY) AS KIT_SUM, SUM(PUR_SUM) OVER( ORDER BY PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY) AS PUR_SUM FROM ( SELECT NUM, MIN(PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY) AS PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY, COUNT(PUR_HIS_PRICE) AS PUR_COUNT, SUM(DECODE(KIT_NO, 0, PUR_HIS_PRICE, 0)) AS KIT_SUM, SUM(DECODE(PLANT_SALE_NO, 0, PUR_HIS_PRICE, 0)) AS PLANT_SUM, SUM(PUR_HIS_PRICE) AS PUR_SUM FROM( SELECT ROUND( ( PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY - TO_DATE (#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 7, 0) + 1 AS NUM , PUR_HIS_PRICE , KIT_NO , PLANT_SALE_NO , PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY FROM PUR_HIS WHERE PUR_HIS_PUR_DAY BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD' )) GROUP BY NUM)
SELECT DISTINCT SUM(PUR_HIS_PRICE) OVER(PARTITION BY MEM_EMAIL) AS PUR_HIS_PRICE, MEM_EMAIL FROM PUR_HIS

SELECT p.pur_his_order_no, p.pur_his_price, p.pur_his_pur_day,pur_his_sale_count, CASE WHEN p.plant_sale_no = 0 THEN k.kit_name ELSE s.plant_sale_title END AS product_name FROM pur_his p LEFT OUTER JOIN kit k ON (p.kit_no = k.kit_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN plant_sale s ON (p.plant_sale_no = s.plant_sale_no) WHERE p.mem_email = #{memEmail} AND p.pur_his_revw_write = 'N'

SELECT p.pur_his_order_no, p.pur_his_price, p.pur_his_pur_day,pur_his_sale_count, CASE WHEN p.plant_sale_no = 0 THEN k.kit_name ELSE s.plant_sale_title END AS product_name FROM pur_his p LEFT OUTER JOIN kit k ON (p.kit_no = k.kit_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN plant_sale s ON (p.plant_sale_no = s.plant_sale_no) WHERE p.mem_email = #{mem_email}
